parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To go down, come down, either from the sky or from higher land, descend. From kata and the base of basis; to descend.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From hos and pos; what(-ever) how, i.e. In the manner that (as adverb or conjunction of coincidence, intentional or actual).

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
